user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Newegg website on a mobile device. The main content includes a banner promoting PC upgrades with discounts, and several navigation options such as "PC Builder," "Gaming PC Finder," and "Today's Best Deals." Below the banner, there are quick access buttons for "Orders," "Wish List," and "Categories." The "Today's Best Deals" section highlights limited-time offers with countdown timers, featuring discounts on PC components like graphics cards and RAM.
